job description:
Our industry-leading client is seeking a Data Scientist to join their dedicated team in Stamford.

Responsibilities of the Data Scientist:
  • Plan and execute the complete analytics life cycle for analytics and modeling projects
  • Survey varied data sources for analytic relevance, including distributed file systems, relational databases, flat files and external sources
  • Experiment, build, test, and maintain analytic/data science models
  • Drive, measure, and articulate business value
  • Build and enhance organizational capabilities in data science
  • Interpret, synthesize and communicate results of analysis to create action and changes within the organization
  • Collaborate across teams to integrate analytic products with existing production architectures, develop, execute and evaluate courses of action and socialize results
Requirements of the Data Scientist:
  • Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Statistics, Engineering, or related required
  • At least 2 years of data science/big data experience
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills
  • Experience working in Hadoop, particularly Spark/MLlib
  • Expert skills and experience with Python and/or R
  • Experience with advanced analytics libraries in Python and R such as pandas, NumPy, scikit learn, and relevant R packages
  • Data pre-processing, exploratory data analysis using a variety of techniques
  • Basic understanding of data architecture, data warehouse and data marts
  • Broad experience and solid theoretical foundation on the modeling process using a variety of algorithmic techniques
  • Expert-level quantitative analysis skills
  • Experience with relational databases
Keywords: Data Scientist, Big Data, Python, R, Spark, MLlib, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit Learn
